summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6098 for the improvement of 25th Avenue Northeast from approximately 175 feet north of East 45th Street to approximately 320 feet south of East 54th Street, and certain other streets, avenues and easements; by constructing sanitary and storm sewer systems therein, and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 8441, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
